Title: Before Your Eyes
Writer: Miraz Bezar, Miraz Bezar (treatment), Evrim Alatas (treatment collaborator), Ricky Watson (translation)
Actors: Senay Orak, Muhammed Al, Hakan Karsak, Suzan Ilir
Plot: Diyarbakir, in the late nineties: Two young Kurdish children are forced to live on the street after their parents have been murdered by a member of a secret state security force.
